resources.string: jan utala li kama wawa
jan utala li kama ijo musi ante. anu la, ona li wile kama ijo musi ante.
o wawa e nasin pi ijo musi sina
ijo musi sina li ken kama lon nasin pona. ona li wawa tawa ijo musi ante.
tawa pi \"tomo awen\"
o awen e jan lawa sina. o tawa e tomo utala sina tawa ni: ona li ken utala e ijo ante.
o anpa e ijo pi awen ijo
ijo musi li awen e ijo ante. sina anpa e ona la, ijo ante li awen ala. sina ken anpa e ijo ante lon tenpo tawa kama sina.
tawa ike pi jan ante
jan ante li pali e tawa ike. sina ken lukin e ona la, sina ken pali e tawa ni: ona li wawa e nasin pi ijo musi sina.
sama wawa pi nasin ijo
nasin pi ijo musi sina li ike. taso, sina ken sama e ona tawa jan ante.
o open e nasin utala
ijo musi li tawa, li open e nasin utala tawa ijo musi ante.
jan lawa li ken moli tan ijo tu
ijo musi wan li tawa, li open e nasin utala tawa ijo musi ante. ijo musi tu li utala e jan lawa lon tenpo sama.
pini musi
jan lawa li awen ala
ijo musi pi mute lili li awen e jan lawa. ken mute la, jan lawa li kama moli.
utala pi nasin tu
ijo musi wan li utala e ijo musi tu.
ijo musi pi awen ike
jan ante li awen ala anu awen ike e ijo musi ona. o anpa e ijo musi ona!
pini musi pi soweli tawa
pini musi ni li jo taso e soweli tawa e jan utala.
musi lili pi tenpo suli
o kama pona lon tenpo tawa tu wan.
musi pi jan pi sona musi
musi lili tan musi pi jan pi sona musi.
musi pi jan wawa
musi lili tan musi pi jan pi wawa mute.
jan lawa li moli
o anpa e jan lawa ante!
moli lon tenpo tawa 1
o moli e jan lawa ante lon tenpo tawa wan.
moli lon tenpo tawa 2
o moli e jan lawa ante lon tenpo tawa tu.
moli lon tenpo tawa 3
o moli e jan lawa ante lon tenpo tawa tu wan.
moli lon tenpo tawa 4
o moli e jan lawa ante lon tenpo tawa tu tu.
moli lon tenpo tawa mute
o lukin e linja tawa ni: jan lawa ante li moli lon tenpo tawa mute.
tenpo insa musi
tawa wan taso
musi lili ni la, o pali e tawa wan taso.
open musi
pini pi jan utala
pini musi li kama. jan utala taso li lon.
ijo musi li tawa la, ijo musi suli pi kule sama li ken anpa.
kama wawa pi jan utala
o wawa e jan utala sina.
o weka e ijo musi lon tenpo ni tawa ni: kama pona li lon tenpo kama.
musi lili pi tenpo lili
o kama pona lon tenpo tawa tu.
musi pi jan pi wawa mute
musi lili tan musi pi jan pi wawa mute.
tawa ale li ike tawa jan ante
jan ante li ken pali e tawa pi mute lili. tawa ale li ike tawa ona.
musi lili tan musi jan
musi lili ni li kama tan musi sina anu musi pi jan ante
jan ale li ken jo e musi lili ni lon lipu \"%s\".
